sentences.english: At that time, a high Bhraman in this assembly whose name was No-dirt and Subtle Light. He was a wise man of profound knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 尔时众中有一大婆罗门名无垢妙光多闻聪慧人所乐见。

sentences.english: You can learn new things, but you can't really change how intelligent you are.
sentences.chinese: 你可以学新东西，但是你无法改变你的聪慧程度。

sentences.english: Go to the ant, you sluggard; consider her ways, and be wise.
sentences.chinese: 懒惰人哪，你去察看蚂蚁的动做，就可得聪慧。

sentences.english: It is said that girls who are praised beautiful are because they are smart and intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 人们常说女孩子因为她们的聪慧而被称赞为美丽。

sentences.english: She has a pair of big eyes, a wise and virtuous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一双大大的眼睛，透露着聪慧与贤淑。

sentences.english: Randy the brilliant, charming, Carnegie educated CS professor.
sentences.chinese: 兰迪聪慧，迷人，卡内基毕业的计算机学教授。

sentences.english: The alpha-wife is desired for her intelligence and her power as a top money earner.
sentences.chinese: 男人想得到阿尔法老婆是因为她聪慧，而且很能挣钱。

sentences.english: Nope, the best brain sharpener may be … sneakers?Yup.
sentences.chinese: 不，使大脑聪慧的最佳砺石或许要数走步。

sentences.english: The wise man used his acumen in the vertical acquaintment device.
sentences.chinese: 聪明人把聪慧用在垂直的广告装寘上。

sentences.english: Suzon is a beautiful and clever girl, who has a love affair with her father.
sentences.chinese: 苏佐是一个美丽聪慧的女孩，她与父亲陷入不伦之恋。

sentences.english: Cynthia Graber reports. Elephants are smart, social animals.
sentences.chinese: 大象是聪慧的社会性动物。

sentences.english: A woman with exquisite sensitivity, unique and genuine, who projects her self-assuredness and inner light to the exterior.
sentences.chinese: 这个女人聪慧，精致，敏感，自信且内心充满阳光。

sentences.english: I’ve heard a couple of [Chinese] people say that Jews are smart because of the Talmud.
sentences.chinese: 我听到一两个中国人说犹太人因《塔木德》而聪慧。

sentences.english: They, perhaps more than others, are determined to build a wiser world.
sentences.chinese: 他们大概比任何人皆果断天要拔擢一个更聪慧的天下。

definition: erudite and multi-talented (idiom); versatile and able
